long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the warmth of love and inspiration with the Romantic Quotes Generator extension. Click on the extension icon and immerse yourself in a collection of heartfelt and romantic quotes. Each time you click the 'Next Quote' button, a new quote will appear, filling your day with affectionate words and deep emotions. 
Need to save or share a quote? 
Simply click the 'Copy Quote' button to effortlessly copy it to your clipboard. With its elegantly designed and responsive user interface, the Romantic Quotes Generator extension provides a delightful experience for anyone seeking a dose of love and romance. Install the extension now and let the magic of words enchant your soul.
Feel free to modify and personalize this description to best represent your extension.
